interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Avajar Blue LED Hydrating Cream Mask 5 Pack - Hydrating Face Masks for Women | Moisturizing Face Mask for Girls | Collagen Face Sheet Masks Set | Korean Face Mask Sheets Pack | Sheet Mask For Face Review Date: 2021/02/19 Store: a DAILY SELF-CARE COSMETICS avajar Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'a DAILY SELF-CARE COSMETICS avajar', 'Item Form': 'Cream, Sheet', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Moisture', 'Scent': 'Hydrating', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Product Dimensions': '5.67 x 0.98 x 7.28 inches; 6.38 Ounces'} Review Text: These masks are too hard to put on your face because the mask is so wet and covered cream, it rips and leaves you without a full face mask. And if and when you can put the mask on your face without ripping it, it is uncomfortable, like you are wearing a wet paper towel. I would give this a pass.

Katiebabs Review Title: Masks Will Rip When Trying to Put on Face (D Grade) Rating: 1.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Strixaderm Lash Advance Eyelash Conditioner - Hypo Allergenic Eyebrow Enhancer Serum & Primer Mascara For Natural Eye Brow Growth & Thick Long Lashes STRIXADERM-MD {'Package Dimensions': '4.4 x 1.4 x 1.3 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'UPC': '096563380000'} Not a fan of this product because I was looking for something more like mascara. It doesn't fit my makeup needs in everyday life.

Katiebabs A Pass For Me (C Grade) Bouquet Garni Body Shower White Musk - Unique Fragrance Decanting Engineering Method gives Long Lasting Rich Fragrance - Gentle and Mild Cleansing Scented Body Wash with Natural Surfactant 17.85 Fl Oz Bouquet Garni {'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Skin Type': 'All, Dry', 'Brand': 'Bouquet Garni', 'Scent': 'Garni', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '8.23 x 6.34 x 3.66 inches; 1.34 Pounds'} If you like the scent of vanilla mixed in with soap, this body wash is for you. It creates a nice lather but it doesn't have that natural smell and more along the lines of chemical. But it does an okay job.

Katiebabs Soap and Vanilla Combined (B Grade) Follain Everybody Bar Soap | Lavender & Bergamot, Skin Moisturizing Hand & Body Cleanser with Shea Butter, Argan Oil, Hydrate for Softer Skin, Non-Drying, Rich-Lather, Cruelty Free, 5 oz Follain {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Brand': 'Follain', 'Scent': 'Bergamot,Lavender', 'Material Feature': 'Cru, Non GMO, Dermatologist Tested', 'Product Dimensions': '3.75 x 2.25 x 1 inches; 5.11 Ounces', 'Item model number': '692764483009', 'UPC': '692764483009'} Nice, scented soap that should fulfill all your bathing needs. The price may be a bit higher than most soaps, but this is a more quality brand and far from generic as you can get.

Katiebabs Nice, scented soap that should fulfill all your bathing needs (B+ Grade) Avajar Blue LED Hydrating Cream Mask 5 Pack - Hydrating Face Masks for Women | Moisturizing Face Mask for Girls | Collagen Face Sheet Masks Set | Korean Face Mask Sheets Pack | Sheet Mask For Face a DAILY SELF-CARE COSMETICS avajar {'Brand': 'a DAILY SELF-CARE COSMETICS avajar', 'Item Form': 'Cream, Sheet', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Moisture', 'Scent': 'Hydrating', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Product Dimensions': '5.67 x 0.98 x 7.28 inches; 6.38 Ounces'} These masks are too hard to put on your face because the mask is so wet and covered cream, it rips and leaves you without a full face mask. And if and when you can put the mask on your face without ripping it, it is uncomfortable, like you are wearing a wet paper towel. I would give this a pass.

Katiebabs Masks Will Rip When Trying to Put on Face (D Grade)
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Makeup Preferences:** The user favors functional makeup products that enhance everyday routines, preferring traditional cosmetics like mascara over conditioning treatments.
- **Quality Expectations:** They have high standards for efficacy and performance, displaying strong dissatisfaction for underperforming products, particularly in skincare and body care.
- **Product Evaluation:** Known for being a critical reviewer, they are discerning and frequently provide low ratings to items that fail to meet their elevated expectations across all categories.
- **Focus on Results:** The user seeks products that deliver immediate visual impact and substantial benefits, with a specific emphasis on effective cleansing and body wash products for noticeable results.
- **Sensitivity to Marketing:** They hold high expectations influenced by marketing claims, often feeling disappointed by products that do not perform as advertised. This emphasizes their desire for transparency and reliability in product descriptions.
- **Broader Preferences:** Recent interactions indicate an increased interest in body care items with naturally derived ingredients and effective cleansing properties. The user appreciates scents that avoid synthetic qualities and is critical of chemical undertones.
- **Recent Experience:** The user has exhibited frustration with a recent product interaction involving face masks, describing issues with application due to the masks being overly wet and uncomfortable. This reinforces their commitment to quality and reliability, signaling a strong preference for products that are both functional and easy to use, while remaining value-conscious.
